message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $110. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to try to get as close to my budget as possible.

I understand your desire to stay within your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer the product to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'd like to offer $100 for the product.
